scripts.deploy:dev: gcloud config set project root-270023 && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/root-270023/eng-42-next-js && gcloud run deploy eng-42-next-js --image gcr.io/root-270023/eng-42-next-js --platform managed --region us-east1
scripts.deploy:prod: gcloud config set project root-270023 && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/root-270023/eng42 && gcloud run deploy eng42 --image gcr.io/root-270023/eng42 --platform managed --region us-east1
